title: PM thanks Amir of Qatar for help in overcoming energy crisis
content:
for always standing by Pakistan and referred to the help extended by his country in overcoming energy crisis in Pakistan.In a tweet on social media platform Twitter, he said, “In 2016 Pakistan concluded an agreement for the procurement of LNG from Qatar on reasonable & competitive price compared to the market.”“This agreement was helpful in overcoming energy crisis. Grateful to HH the Amirof Qatar for always standing by Pakistan.”
